name: Chronolapse
description:
Time is running out. Deliver Time Coins to the main island Clock and escape your nightmare before you leave your dream. 

Chronolapse is a surrealist/psychedelic 3D platformer where you collect seconds to delay the inevitable: waking up.

WASD - Move
SPACE - Jump / Double Jump
MOUSE - View
ESC - Quit Game
R - Restart

Game artist 2D/3D: Francisco Lucas @ciscookiess Francisco_ Game artist 2D: Leticia Moeller @guaaxi_ Instagram Unreal Engine Programmer:  Nathan Gabriel NeitherNathan @NeitherNathan Sound and music:  Patrick Stefano

@ptkstefano

Soundcloud

Changelog for version 1.1:

 - Some unreachable places have been corected

 - T button does not instantly kill you anymore

 - Buffering time for next token spawn reduced, which rendered the game unplayable before.

 - Bug that made the post-death screen show "You dreamed 0 seconds" corrected.

Changelog for version 1.2:
 - Jumping fixed
 - Clock fixed
